sentence.Network_en: The stage sets were designed rather unimaginatively.
sentence.Network_cn: 舞台场景设置得毫无想象力.

sentence.Network_en: The fault, instead, is with the unimaginatively static pricing on the part of the food retailers.
sentence.Network_cn: 相反, 过错在于食品零售商缺乏想象力的静态定价方式.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Requiem : in Paradisium is also unnecessarily experimental , with overlapping fuzz and tape effects diluting the sound ; the looped drum track is also unimaginatively integrated .《安魂曲：在天国》也未必是实验派作风，重叠的电子失真音像效果冲淡了钢琴的演奏；不间断的鼓声更是毫无想象力的组合。

Requiem : in Paradisium is also unnecessarily experimental , with overlapping fuzz and tape effects diluting the sound ; the looped drum track is also unimaginatively integrated .《安魂曲：在天国》也未必是实验派作风，重叠的电子失真音像效果冲淡了钢琴的演奏；不间断的鼓声更是毫无想象力的组合。

list.abs: I think the willfully unimaginative see more monsters ., 我认为 , 缺乏想象力的人会看到更多的恶魔.
